meta.title: NTI & COVID-19 Information - Harrison County Schools

link.title: Westside Elementary - News

div.h1: GOVERNOR BESHEAR ANNOUNCES IN-PERSON CLASSES WILL NOT RESUME THIS SCHOOL YEAR.

div.p:
Cynthiana, Kentucky (April 20, 2020) - Today at approximately 2:20, Kentucky Governor Andy Beshear announced to Kentucky's superintendents that schools would not be able to return to regular in-person classes for the remainder of the current school year.
For the full article, click here.

div.h1: Harrison County Schools making changes to food service program

div.p: Harrison County Schools' meal service program is undergoing some changes starting Monday, April 20, 2020. Visit https://www.harrison.kyschools.us/News/152#sthash.QzAzH0S2.dpbs for more details.

span.p:

For the full article, click here.
